messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Easy readers for tween
messages.msgSnippet: ... We used some nice easy reader Science books from Hello, Reader series that were about bugs, animals, etc.  DK also has some simple readers that are
messages.messageBody:
> Does anyone have
> ideas on easy readers that are a little more interesting for tweens? (That
> would inolve babysitting, horses or Mary Kate and Ashley? LOL )

We used some nice easy reader Science books from Hello, Reader series that
were about bugs, animals, etc. DK also has some simple readers that are
sciencey. I know that's not babysitting, etc., but at least it's not about
kindergarten! I got those off the shelf at Barnes and Noble. Thin
paperbacks, $3-5 each.

brenda
